content: currently i am trying to get an ldap connection working, when i call manage.py with query_ldap i get a result. In my Zulip Organisation management i can't see ldap in the authentication tab, only email. I restarted my zulip with the restart script, anyone got the same issue?
@Henry Voß can you post your ldap settings in setting.py?
Fixed it.. When you assign keys in the setting.px multiple times it can't work ;)
